label: 顔見世
本: Edo Culture: Daily Life and Diversions in Urban Japan, 1600-1868 . University of Hawai'i Press . 1997
説明文: [Also kaomise kyōgen 顔見世狂言］Face-showing play in the Edo kabuki,held during the eleventh month of the year, at which the actors contracted for the ensuing season were introduced to the audience.［歌舞伎］
